TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CombinatorialTestCaseProvider extends System.Object implements class Xamarin.iOS.dll=NUnit.Framework.Extensibility.ITestCaseProvider

Docs.summary: CombinatorialTestCaseProvider creates test cases from individual parameter data values, combining them using the CombiningStrategy indicated by an Attribute used on the test method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HasTestCasesFor(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo method) cil managed

Docs.param: A MethodInfo representing a parameterized test
Docs.summary: Determine whether any test cases are available for a parameterized method.
Docs.returns: True if any cases are available, otherwise false.
